name: Ukraina Battle Tank!: PUTIN SURVIVOR
description:
Awaken inside a battle Tank in the middle of nowhere around Ukraine. You have to fight for your life against the invasion of the angry russian tanks, that are being mind control by Putinium( A big Putin pyramid from outta space).
- You play as a Tank and you dont want to die so no matter what course, even as far as killing President Putin with a fidget spinner to have a sip of Stolichnaya Vodka back at your sweet home.
-With the newly power boost given by obama , the slaves and all the memes.You finally have a chance for surviving and take putinium into the ♂DEEP♂DARK♂DUNGEON.
-For this you must survive and take down as many of those bastards in this high-speed top down shooter bullet hell warface while vibing with hard bass
* 10% of this game revenue will go to charity to support the people who is affected by the war *
For more information you can check out below
*Feature:
*Collect 5 OBAMIUMS then OBAMA will grand you his divine power*
Obama choose you to become his champion to defeat putinium's legion of doom , Use his dark magic wisely .

EPIC BATTLE(Bass boosted)

Many Powerups

- Multiple Endings
- Russia-Ukraina Voice support
- Simple and Fun Gameplay
- Good Soundtrack ( credits: ANTONIN CHACHKINE)
- Steam achievements ( 60+)
- Over 50+ items
*For more information about the charity you can check out my subreddit and the Steam announcements: update soon *

Only you have the power to end all of this chaos , So take my hand and strike PUTINIUM with all your memes might
